description.value:
Frequency once per round

Trigger You craft an @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Elixir of Life (Minor)]{Elixir of Life} using @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.classfeatures.Quick Alchemy]{Quick Alchemy}, and that elixir is at least 2 levels lower than your advanced alchemy level

You mix a special additive into your elixir that calms the drinker's body and mind.

The elixir of life attempts to counteract one fear effect or one effect imposing the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed} condition on the drinker using the item's level and a counteract modifier equal to your class DC - 10.
